channel.title: #151: Advice on validating and building a bootstrapped B2B SaaS
channel.description:
I answer several questions from a loyal listener who wants advice on building a B2B SaaS similar in scope and style to my product, [Feature Upvote](https://featureupvote.com/).
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/378e0257-4553-4715-a5a9-eca25cdde547?dark=false"></iframe>
You can also [listen to this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/151-advice-on-validating-and-building-a-bootstrapped-b2b-saas/).
